definitions.definition: Undyed leather from the skin of buffalo or similar animals.
A tool, often one covered with buff leather, used for polishing.
A military coat made of buff leather.
A person who is very interested in a particular subject; an enthusiast.
An effect that makes a character or item stronger.
definitions.example: I just picked up an epic damage buff! Let's go gank the other team!

definitions.definition: Compressive coupler force that occurs during a slack bunched condition.
The greyish viscid substance constituting the buffy coat.
A substance used to dilute (street) drugs in order to increase profits.
To polish and make shiny by rubbing.
definitions.example: He was already buffing the car's hubs.

definitions.definition: To make a character or an item stronger.
definitions.example: I noticed that the pistols were buffed in the update.

definitions.definition: To modify a medical chart, especially in a dishonest manner.
A buffalo, or the meat of a buffalo.
